text.english: Teorema: \(\texttt{belList}\) of the pre-visit (\(\texttt{visit2}\)) of a tree is equal to \(\texttt{belBT}\) of the tree, i.e. \[ \forall t \in BT_A . \; \forall b \in A. \; \texttt{belList}(\texttt{visist2}(t),b) = \texttt{belBT}(t,b) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: \(\texttt{belList}\) della visita anticipa (\(\texttt{visit2}\)) di un albero Ã¨ equivalente a \(\texttt{belBT}\) dell'albero, i.e. \[ \forall t \in BT_A . \; \forall b \in A. \; \texttt{belList}(\texttt{visist2}(t),b) = \texttt{belBT}(t,b) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem belBT_belList: forall t : bte , forall b : A , belList (visit2 t) b = belBT t b.
